issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Install KS on iOS 8 device.
2. Navigate to BaseUI>Views> EmailDialog
Allow to select Photo from gallery

{color:red}*Actual Result:*{color}
Unable to edit/delete default added Recipients

{color:green}*Expected Result:*{color}
Should be able to edit/delete default added Recipients

On iOS7 working fine.
fields.summary: iOS8: Unable to edit/delete default added Recipients in EmailDialog
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio:3.3.0.201407111535
Sdk:3.3.0.GA
alloy:1.4.0
titanium:3.3.0
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
acs:1.0.15
npm:1.3.2
OS:Maverick(10.9.3)
Device: iPhone5S(v8.0),IpadAir(v8.0)
xcode: Xcode6Beta4

comments.body:
This could have been a Apple Bug. Tested Xcode 6 beta 5 cannot reproduce.

Tested on iPhone 5s running iOS 8 beta 5
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced and due to the above comments.
